channel.title: openCV on Karim EL-KHEDDOUMI

item.title: Project II: Face recognition attendence application
item.description: Attendance issues are among the most challenging problems teachers face in their classrooms. Classroom management is one of the key areas where a lot of time is wasted. Replacing these manual tasks of attendance taking, assignments management with some innovations soloutions using IA and face recognation models can save a lot of precious teaching time. In this project we build a simple application using Python and openCV with a tkinter gui interface.
